name: @pxblue/symbols-mui
description: PX Blue symbols for Material UI
author: px-blue <pxblue@eaton.com>

scripts.refresh: yarn upgrade && cd mui-icon-builder && yarn upgrade && cd ..
scripts.mui: yarn remove:sprite && cd mui-icon-builder && babel-node --config-file ./babel.config.js builder.js --output-dir ../symbols --svg-dir ../node_modules/@pxblue/symbols && cd .. && yarn babelfy
scripts.svgr: yarn remove:sprite && npx @svgr/cli -d symbols node_modules/@pxblue/symbols --template mui-template.js --expand-props none --no-dimensions && yarn babelfy
scripts.publish:full: yarn clear && yarn refresh && yarn mui && npm version patch && npm publish
